ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Boxes, & FREE 1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
32 Cameras: 16*Bullet Cameras, 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 ft IR Distance, Wide Dynamic Range, OSD Menu, Vandal proof & water proof ;; 16*Dome Cameras, 1/3" Effio CCD, Indoor use, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft IR Distance, Vandalproof, Wide Dynamic Range, OSD Menu.
32 Channel DVR with 6TB HDD: H.264 960H Realtime. 960×480 & 30fps recording. D1mode/960Hmode：30fps playback. Playback Channel: 1/4/9/16 Channel. Supports HDMI & VGA outputs. Supports eSATA. 2 UBS Ports
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprise CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 32 Channel 960H DVR 6TB HDD Real Time Recording+Playback, 32 Cameras 700 TV Lines Vari-Focal Lens(16*Bullet & 16*Dome), iPhone Android Viewable
